title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.8 - Fiscal officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.8 - Fiscal officer

State Regulations

All inquiries regarding the access of bona fide members of
the news media to the commission's public employment records, in accordance
with the provisions of section 88(1)(g) should be directed to the fiscal
officer at the offices of the commission. The fiscal officer is Mrs. Carolyn

Marino. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6700.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
